00028     class Statement {
00029 
00030         public:
00031             Statement(const Parser *_parser, const std::string &_arg):
00032                 m_arg(_arg), m_parser(_parser) { }
00033             virtual bool execute();
00034 
00035         protected:
00036             const std::string &arg() { return m_arg; }
00037             const Parser *parser() { return m_parser; }
00038 
00039         private:
00040             std::string m_arg;
00041             const Parser *m_parser;
00042     };

00046     class BoolStatement: public Statement {
00047         public:
00048             BoolStatement (const Parser *p, const std::string &_arg);
00049             virtual bool execute() = 0;
00050 
00051         protected:
00052             bool getValue() { return m_bool; }
00053 
00054         private:
00055             bool m_bool;
00056     };
